scenario_text.value: Ah, dammit! It’s hard to walk here...!

Maybe you should take it a bit slower,
Shuuji...?
Shut up! Don’t tell me what to do!

Keep your mouth shut and do as I say! Got
that?!

(He sure is pissed. I should pass on trying
to talk to him in this state.)

(Shuuji’s still upset. I’ll talk to him once
he’s calmed down a little.)
